solution_line_template: Her recipe calls for {recipe_cup} cup of juice but she wants to double that so she needs {recipe_cup}+{recipe_cup} = {total_cup} cup of lime juice

{tablespoons_per_cup} tablespoons are in 1 cup and she only needs {total_cup} cup so she needs {tablespoons_per_cup}*{total_cup} = <<{tablespoons_per_cup}*{total_cup}={total_tablespoons}>>{total_tablespoons} tablespoons of juice

{tablespoon_per_lime} key lime yields 1 tablespoon of juice and she needs {total_tablespoons} tablespoons so she needs {tablespoon_per_lime}*{total_tablespoons} = <<{tablespoon_per_lime}*{total_tablespoons}={key_limes_needed}>>{key_limes_needed} key limes
